title: Server Initialisation
text: Nuxt सर्वर इनिट , unlike other hooks we are about to learn, this is the only hook that's not defined on page component!.

title: Route Middleware
text: रूट मिड्लवेर allows you to intercept incoming request and conditionally modify or enforce business logic before serving the page on client-side.

title: Validating Route Params
text: वेलिडेट hook does exactly what the term suggests, it validates parameter defined in dynamic routes.

title: Fetch and set initial data
text: With असिंक डेटा और फ़ेच You can pull data into page component and set them locally using asyncData method. asyncData() is called every time before loading page component.
